data.name: AT_LEAST_ONE_INGREDIENT
data.value: Note that at least one ingredient is required.

data.name: AT_LEAST_ONE_INSTRUCTION
data.value: Please ensure there is at least one instruction provided for the recipe.

data.name: CODE_INVALID
data.value: Invalid code.

data.name: CODE_RESET_PASSWORD_REQUIRED
data.value: A code to reset your password is required.

data.name: COOKING_TIME_NOT_SUPPORTED
data.value: The provided cooking time value is not supported.

data.name: DIFFICULTY_LEVEL_NOT_SUPPORTED
data.value: The specified difficulty level for the recipe is not supported.

data.name: DISH_TYPE_NOT_SUPPORTED
data.value: The chosen dish type is not supported.

data.name: DUPLICATED_INGREDIENTS_IN_LIST
data.value: Duplicated ingredients are not allowed in the list.

data.name: EMAIL_ALREADY_REGISTERED
data.value: Email already registered on the platform.

data.name: EMAIL_EMPTY
data.value: The email cannot be empty.

data.name: EMAIL_INVALID
data.value: The email is invalid.

data.name: EMAIL_OR_PASSWORD_INVALID
data.value: Invalid e-mail and/or password.

data.name: EXPIRED_CODE
data.value: The code is expired.

data.name: EXPIRED_SESSION
data.value: Your session has expired. Please log in again to continue.

data.name: GENERATE_ONE_RECIPE_PER_DAY
data.value: Sorry, you can only generate one recipe per day. Come back tomorrow!

data.name: INGREDIENT_EMPTY
data.value: The ingredient is left empty, please provide a valid value.

data.name: INGREDIENT_NOT_FOLLOWING_PATTERN
data.value: Invalid ingredient format. Please ensure the ingredient follows our pattern.

data.name: INSTRUCTION_EMPTY
data.value: The instruction is left empty, please provide a valid instruction.

data.name: INSTRUCTION_EXCEEDS_LIMIT_CHARACTERS
data.value: The instruction exceeds the maximum limit of 2000 characters.

data.name: INVALID_NUMBER_INGREDIENTS
data.value: Invalid number of ingredients. The list must contain between 1 and 5 ingredients.

data.name: INVALID_PASSWORD
data.value: The password must be longer than 6 characters.

data.name: INVALID_SESSION
data.value: We couldn't find a valid session. Please log in to access this feature.

data.name: NAME_EMPTY
data.value: The name cannot be empty.

data.name: NON_NEGATIVE_INSTRUCTION_STEP
data.value: Use a non-negative value for the instruction step.

data.name: NO_TOKEN
data.value: Request don't have token.

data.name: ONLY_IMAGES_ACCEPTED
data.value: Only images (PNG, JPG, JPEG) are accepted.

data.name: PASSWORD_DIFFERENT_CURRENT_PASSWORD
data.value: The password entered is different from the current password.

data.name: PASSWORD_EMPTY
data.value: The password cannot be empty.

data.name: RECIPE_NOT_FOUND
data.value: The recipe could not be found.

data.name: RECIPE_TITLE_EMPTY
data.value: The recipe title has been left blank. Please provide a valid title.

data.name: TWO_OR_MORE_INSTRUCTIONS_SAME_ORDER
data.value: When adding instructions, please ensure that each one has a unique step number. Two or more instructions cannot have the same step.

data.name: UNKNOWN_ERROR
data.value: Unknown error.

data.name: USER_WITHOUT_PERMISSION_ACCESS_RESOURCE
data.value: You can't access this resource.
